message: Welcome to our store! Our products come with a 50% chance of being high-quality. For this round, we're offering a product at a fixed price of $100000. Given the uncertainty, you might want to consider our track record; so far, half of our products have been of high quality. Please make an informed decision based on this information.
I'll take the product. I'm willing to take the risk for the potential reward of $2000000.
